examples: Good heavens! Whatever time is it?!

definitions.definition: Regardless of the ... that; for any ... that.
examples: Whatever your choice, there will be consequences.
I will stick with you, whatever fate befalls us.

definitions.definition: Any ... that; of no matter what type or kind that.
examples: Whatever doubts I had were quickly dispelled.
Write down whatever thoughts come into your mind.

definitions.definition: Any ; of no matter what type or kind.
examples: He must be stopped, whatever the cost.

main_definition: ( interrogative ) What ever ; emphatic form of 'what'.
secondary_definitions: Regardless of the ... that; for any ... that.
Any ... that; of no matter what type or kind that.
Any ; of no matter what type or kind.
